name: Open Source HardWare Library - SELECTION
tagline: OSHW documents, ready for you to read
body:
**no content yet, check out [OSHWL *candidates*](http://oshwl.github.io/candidates/)**

#*SELECTION*

**selected documents about [Open-Source Hardware](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open-source_hardware), ready for you to read**

the idea behind OSHWL is to document the existing constellation of OSHW projects, so that OSHW actors can make stuff in a smarter way.

having that information gathered and structured should do some good. even better would be to cultivate quality, of content (selecting OSHW projects that kind of make sense) and form (making documents readable to enjoyable).

candidate documents for OSHW *SELECTION* can be found in [OSHWL *candidates*](http://oshwl.github.io/candidates/). everyone is welcome to meddle with them or add new ones!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
